body_html:
@prb12 same issue here. I installed Bazel using custom APT repository. Do I have to install Java JDK then? I feel like there's some other 'Java thing' not being installed, which I have no idea what it is.

Update: Why does installing Bazel using custom APT repository not install the JDK mentioned in the second installing option? I Tried to install JDK, and the issue is solved. Phew

body:
@prb12 same issue here. I installed Bazel using custom APT repository. Do I have to install Java JDK then? I feel like there's some other 'Java thing'  not being installed, which I have no idea what it is.

Update: Why does installing Bazel using custom APT repository not install the JDK mentioned in the second installing option? I Tried to install JDK, and the issue is solved. Phew
